hero.name: Maxwell Paulo
hero.title: Front-End Developer
hero.subtitle: Crafting seamless and engaging digital experiences. Let's build something amazing together.

aboutSection.title: About Me
aboutSection.paragraph1: Hello! I'm Maxwell Paulo, a passionate Front-End Developer dedicated to creating intuitive, dynamic, and high-performance web experiences. With a keen eye for design and a strong foundation in modern web technologies, I strive to build applications that not only look great but also provide a seamless user journey.
aboutSection.paragraph2: My journey in web development is driven by a constant desire to learn and adapt to the ever-evolving digital landscape. I enjoy tackling complex challenges and transforming ideas into tangible, impactful solutions.

exp1.description: Developed and maintained responsive web applications using React and Next.js. Collaborated with UI/UX designers to implement user-friendly interfaces. Optimized applications for maximum speed and scalability.

exp2.description: Assisted senior developers in building and testing website components. Gained experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and version control systems like Git. Contributed to a project for a major client, focusing on front-end tasks.
